parameters.description: Path and file name of the bitmap for the tab of this Task Pane view (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ToolTip
parameters.description: ToolTip for this Task Pane view

title: ISldWorks.CreateTaskpaneView2
signature:
TaskpaneView CreateTaskpaneView2( 
   System.String
Bitmap
,
   System.String
ToolTip
)

parameters.name: Bitmap
parameters.description: Path and file name of the bitmap for the tab of this Task Pane view (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ToolTip
parameters.description: ToolTip for this Task Pane view

remarks: The bitmap should be 16 colors and 16 x 18 (width x height) pixels. Any portions of the bitmap that are white (RGB 255,255,255) will be transparent.
